Package framework.wrappers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorHandlingFeatureChecker
    This extends the abstract feature check so as to allow for exceptions to be thrown and turns them into failures.
    FeatureCheckerWrapper
    This wraps a Checkable in a feature checker so as to handle the exceptions.
    GradingFeatureWrapper
    This is a simple wrapper which prevents the text editor from opening when the checker returns null.
    ProjectDatabaseWrapper
    This extends the project database class to support adding ProjectRequirements
    ProjectStepperDisplayerWrapper
    This wraps the "framework" GUI in a ProjectStepperDisplayer
    ProjectWrapper
    This wraps a "grader" project in a "framework" project.
    TestCaseWrapper
    This wraps a feature in a test case so the "grader" checkers can run in the "framework" system.
